comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Francis Bowes Sayre, married to Jessie Wilson, the president's daughter, in 1913.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Sayre was born in 1885, two years before his bride, Jessie Woodrow Wilson, the President's daughter. He was 28 when they were wed, on November 25, 1913. They had two sons and a daughter, all now deceased. She died in 1933; he lived on until 1972. His Wikipedia page (not yet complete) shows yet another LOC photo of him at this desk, facing the other way, but that photo has not yet been posted on Flickr: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Francis_B._Sayre But this photo, nearly identical, has been posted: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4526080096/in/photostream/]

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Thank you pennylrichardsca and Wystan for the addition information about Sayre and for linking these two images.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Another Bain/LOC photo of Sayre, his last name misspelled by both Bain and LOC, was posted on Flickr on April 30, 2010:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4565504876/]

And this one was posted in May:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4626423683/in/photostream/]

Yet another was posted in July:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4818009605/in/photostream/]
